text: Matthew Smith, more commonly known as dangmattsmith (stylized in all lowercase), is an American YouTube comedian and actor known for his reaction videos. He created his YouTube channel on August 17, 2011. As of May 2020, his channel reached over 1.88 billion views, making it the 1,608th most viewed channel of all time, along with 11.8 million subscribers, making it the 491st most-subscribed channel on YouTube. He won the award for "Best YouTube Comedian" at the 10th Shorty Awards in 2018. ==References== Category:Living people Category:American YouTubers Category:21st-century American comedians Category:21st-century American male actors Category:African-American comedians Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Shorty Award winners
title: Dangmattsmith
